content: Investments Lifestyle Savings Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 13 Aug 2019Does investment in the RSP count as an investment as indicated in the DBS multiplier account? I believe investment in StashAway is not counted?I just applied for a DBS multiplier account but the thing is I am not going to use a credit card. I have a UOB One card and going to open a UOB One account(joint). Not going to credit the salary in there though. Based on the above, I'm guessing I have only 2 valid transactions?1 answerAnswerBump0

NHNur Huda IsmailLevel 1. FreshieAnswered on 13 Aug 2019Yes it does, but, if I'm not mistaken, it have to be after you've applied for the multiplier acct0 comments0
